attributes.action: ban violent, oppressive and terrorist-supporting countries from participating in the 2012 Games
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Countries such as Israel, Kenya, Zimbabwe et al should be banned from participating in or attending the Games. We do this when we expel another country for espionage and breaking trade embargos, so why not for acts against humanity. The World deserves better; we need to make a stand.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
